content:
How about considering the following outdoor and giant fun game ideas for your brainstorming session:

1. Giant Connect Four: This game is a larger version of the classic game Connect Four where players take turns placing colored disks into a vertical board, aiming to get four of their colored disks in a row. A giant version of the game can be made using large discs and a vertical frame.
2. Giant Twister: Twister is a game where players place their limbs on colored circles on a mat, trying not to fall over. A giant version of the game can be played outside with a large mat and inflatable dice.
3. Giant Inflatable Obstacle Course: A giant inflatable obstacle course can be set up outdoors and can be fun for all ages. It can include various obstacles like slides, tunnels, walls, and other challenges.
4. Giant Yard Games: There are many classic yard games that can be made into giant versions, such as giant versions of cornhole, bowling, or horseshoes.
5. Giant Trampoline Dodgeball: This is a game where players bounce on a giant trampoline and try to dodge balls thrown by other players.
6. Giant Chess: A giant outdoor chess set can be created using large chess pieces and a large board.
7. Human Hungry Hungry Hippos: In this game, players wear helmets with baskets attached and try to collect as many balls as possible by sliding across the ground on their stomachs.

These are just a few ideas to get you started. You can modify or combine these ideas to come up with something unique and exciting. Good luck with your brainstorming session!
